name: Farmiga
overview: FARMIGA: - potatoes can be planted - improved graphics smoothness - underlined house graphics and added toilet - after opening the toilet, we will find a moonshine distillery - in the current version, we can produce one bottle of moonshine so far (you cannot get all the products needed for distillation yet) - to produce moonshine, you have to click the distillery several times and wait, because each time a different product for distillation leaves off (sugar, potatoes, wheat, yeast and a bottle)
